translation.en: [woman over radio] Attention all units, attention all units.
translation.ja: ミネソタ州　10年前 全パトカーに告ぐ人質事件が発生した模様

translation.en: Probable domestic disturbance with hostage situation.
translation.ja: 全パトカーに告ぐ人質事件が発生した模様

translation.en: 10-24, officer down. Perp is a Caucasian male, no known priors.
translation.ja: 現場に急行して下さい警官が撃たれました

translation.en: Considered extremely dangerous. Proceed with caution.
[man 1 over radio] Unit 16. Suspect is Ray Hutchinson,
translation.ja: 容疑者はレイ･ハチンソン38歳　身長188

translation.en: 38, 6'2", white male, medium build, ex-wife...
translation.ja: 容疑者はレイ･ハチンソン38歳　身長188 人質がいる

translation.en: [man 2 over radio] We've got three hostages, ex-wife and two kids. Situation is extremely unstable.
translation.ja: 人質は元妻と子供２人容疑者は興奮状態

translation.en: [woman] Suspect is wanted in connection with the murder of a police officer. He should be considered armed and dangerous.
translation.ja: 武器を所持していて危険です

translation.en: [Ray over phone] I'm not coming out, you hear me? I'm not coming out.
translation.ja: 投降なんて絶対にしない

translation.en: I want everyone gone. You, your men, snipers, everyone.
translation.ja: みんな早くうせろ　狙撃手(スナイパー)も

translation.en: If I don't see taillights in the next five minutes, you're not gonna like what happens next.
translation.ja: ５分で消えないと人質の命はない

translation.en: -[line clicks] -Ray?
Can you get him back on the phone?
He's done talking.
-Do it. -Yes, sir.
[commander over radio] Gold Unit, this is HR1. Move to green.
translation.ja: ゴールド班 突入しろ

translation.en: Ma'am, come with me.
FBI, show me your hands! Hands!
translation.ja: ＦＢＩだ 手を見せろ　早く！

translation.en: Turn around!
Oh, shit.
-Got him clean, boss. -Ben, no.
translation.ja: 撃てます ベン よせ　やつは丸腰だ

translation.en: He's not carrying.
translation.ja: ベン よせ　やつは丸腰だ

translation.en: Ray. Ray, look at me.
-[sobbing] -It's all over.
I didn't want it to end like this. It's not supposed to end like this.
translation.ja: こんな終わり方にはしたくない

translation.en: Put your son down and step away.
-I'm sorry. -It's okay.
translation.ja: すまない いいんだ

translation.en: Good. [exhales]
-No! -[explosion]
[pilot] Command, this is Navy Alpha two-one-niner en route to Beaufort Naval Hospital.
translation.ja: ヘリで海軍病院へ向かいます

translation.en: [nurse 1] Three, two, one, lift.
[nurse 2] He's ready for you, Lieutenant.
You're gonna be okay.
[newsman] From the Great Pyramid of Giza to the Tower of Babel,
translation.ja: ピラミッドからバベルの塔へ

translation.en: brick by brick and stone by stone,
mankind has been consumed by one singular desire, to touch the sky.
translation.ja: 人は願いを追い続けた“空へ達すること”

translation.en: [newswoman] Perhaps, finally, we've done it.
[newsman 2] The brainchild of former tech magnate, Zhao Long Ji. -[woman] Zhao Long Ji. -[man] Zhao Long Ji.
translation.ja: ジャオ･ロンジーが建てました

translation.en: Visionary entrepreneur Zhao Long Ji...
[newsman] Who has spared no expense creating this city in the sky,
translation.ja: 空に街を作ったのです

translation.en: going so far as to build a 30-story vertical park at the building's center.
translation.ja: 30階分の垂直の公園まで作りました

translation.en: The Pearl speaks to what we can achieve when we don't accept limitations.
translation.ja: パール･ビルは無限の象徴だ

translation.en: [newsman 3] This isn't just another building.
[newswoman 2] The tallest building on Earth.
[newsman] This high-tech high-rise generates  all of its energy needs
translation.ja: 必要な電気エネルギーは⸺

translation.en: from a massive double helix wind turbine near its top.
translation.ja: 螺旋(らせん)状の風力タービンで

translation.en: [newswoman] Dwarfing the Burj Khalifa and tripling the height of the venerable Empire State Building.
translation.ja: ブルジュ･ハリファより更に高く…

translation.en: -[newsman] Over 3,000 feet. -[both] The Pearl.
[newswoman] The Pearl's lower half has delighted the public for six months.
translation.ja: 下半分は先にオープン

translation.en: [newsman 4] Its residential upper half has yet to open its doors.
translation.ja: 上半分の居住階はまだです

translation.en: [newsman] Buildings shape our society.
translation.ja: より良いビルがより良い…

translation.en: -Better buildings... -[newswoman] Better cities.
translation.ja: より良いビルがより良い… 街を…

translation.en: [newsman] A better world.
[newswoman 2] But it's the mysterious sphere that has the world buzzing.
[newsman] In a statement released today,
translation.ja: 今日 オーナーから発表があり⸺

translation.en: the secretive billionaire confirmed that despite rumors
translation.ja: 今日 オーナーから発表があり⸺ 安全への懸念の声をよそに上半分も⸺

translation.en: of an inability to fully insure a structure this size,
translation.ja: 安全への懸念の声をよそに上半分も⸺

translation.en: plans to open the building's upper half remain on track.
translation.ja: 予定どおりオープンです

translation.en: [newswoman 3] He promises that the sphere will be the number one tourist attraction in the world, with views of Hong Kong...
translation.ja: 球体は旅行者の人気となり香港の景色を…

translation.en: The screens go off, shoes go on. It's panda time.
translation.ja: 靴を履いて　パンダ見物よ

translation.en: Where's your dad? I need him to fix my phone before we go.
translation.ja: パパは？　スマホが変なの

translation.en: -Bathroom. -Okay.
[Georgia] He's talking to himself again.
Ah, screw it. I'm just gonna high-five the guy.
You okay?
Yeah. -Yeah, just some leg stuff, you know. -Mmm.
translation.ja: いいよ　左足はないが

translation.en: Well, you look very handsome.
-You think so? -Mmm-hmm. Does it look like I'm trying too hard?
translation.ja: そう？堅苦しい格好かな？

translation.en: No, it looks respectful.
Maybe I lose the tie?
No, but you should learn to tie one. Come here.
translation.ja: ダメ　でも結び方が変

translation.en: I can hear your gears turning. What's going on?
I just don't want to screw it up, you know.
You're not gonna screw it up.
I don't know. What if I missed something?
Baby, there's no way you've missed something.
You've been preparing for this meeting for six months. I've never seen you work harder on anything.
translation.ja: 半年間 真剣に準備してきたのよ

translation.en: You're ready for this. You know this place better than the architect. You're gonna do great.
translation.ja: 設計者よりこのパール･ビルに詳しい

translation.en: They flew you out here for a reason. They want to hear what you have to say.
translation.ja: 率直な考えを皆さんに

translation.en: Yeah, hope so. Ben stuck his neck out for me and then, you know,
translation.ja: そうだなベンも応援してくれてる

translation.en: this could be a real game-changer for us. They give stuff like this to big companies. I work out of our garage.
translation.ja: 人生の転機だ小さな会社に大仕事が来た

translation.en: Yeah, it's a good garage.
Okay, look, just because you're a smaller company does not mean that you don't belong
translation.ja: たとえ小さな会社でも誇りを持って

translation.en: and, for the record,
translation.ja: たとえ小さな会社でも誇りを持って ベンも友達だからこそ一役買ってくれたの

translation.en: Ben stuck his neck out for you because he's your friend and that's what friends do.
translation.ja: ベンも友達だからこそ一役買ってくれたの

translation.en: Hey. Look at me. Look at me.
You've got this.
I love you.
-You better. -[both chuckle]
Come here.
My phone isn't working.
-[laughs] -Oh, so, was all the,
"Hey, look at me, you've got this, you look so handsome," just a way of buttering me up to fix your phone again?
translation.ja: “ステキ”と言ったのはまた直させるためか

translation.en: It's a distinct possibility.
All right, well, what do I tell you to do any time something's wrong with your phone?
Try turning it off and on again.
[Will] Try turning it off and on again.
90% of the time, you can fix a problem by turning it off and on again.
translation.ja: 不調の９割は再起動をかければ直る

translation.en: So, did you, uh, try turning it off and on again?
Nope. I like it better when you do it. It gives you a sense of accomplishment.
translation.ja: あなたに やらせてあげる

translation.en: Oh, I see. So you're asking me to fix your phone for me?
translation.ja: 直す機会を与えてくれたわけか

translation.en: [chuckles] You're welcome.
Put your coats in your bags.
[Will] All right, kids. You guys are gonna go see pandas. -[Sarah gasps] Pandas. -Daddy's gonna go make that bacon.
translation.ja: お前たちはパンダ見物パパは大事な お仕事だ

translation.en: -[children laugh] -Let me ask you a question. -Daddy loves who? -Me.
translation.ja: パパはだれを愛してる？

translation.en: -Daddy loves who? -Me.
-Daddy loves who? -[both] Me! Me!
-Can't hear you. Can't hear you. -[both] Me! Me! -Confidence. Not confident. -Me! Me! -Daddy loves who? -Me! Me!
translation.ja: 聞こえない　パパはだれを？

translation.en: Okay, okay, you know what? You're both right. -Because Daddy loves you both. -Aw...
translation.ja: よし 分かったパパは２人とも愛してる

translation.en: [Sarah] I got to get a chant.
-You fixed it? -As always.
[gasps] You really do love me.
-Eh, kind of. -[laughs] Come here.
Gross.
-My brother. -Brother.
Get in here.
Sarah, you look beautiful.
Mmm, thank you. It's so good to see you.
-Come on. -Right? I know.
You're kidding me. These are the twins?
translation.ja: あの双子？　大きくなった

translation.en: They're so big now. What are you guys up to?
translation.ja: あの双子？　大きくなった 見物へ？

translation.en: -We're going to see the pandas. -I heard.
translation.ja: パンダの この特別券で夕食中のパンダを見られる

translation.en: This'll get you in to see the nighttime panda feeding. -[both laughing] Whoa... -After everybody's left.
translation.ja: この特別券で夕食中のパンダを見られる

translation.en: Very hard to come by.
-Thank you. -But I know a lot of pandas, so. -[all laugh] -There you go. Some gear, just to look the part.
translation.ja: パンダのファンさ帽子とシャツだ

translation.en: -[Sarah] What do you guys say? -[both] Thank you.
translation.ja: もらったら… ありがと

translation.en: Get out of here, go have fun. I'll see you tonight, honey.
translation.ja: 行って じゃ 今夜

translation.en: Good luck.
-Love you. -See you guys.
translation.ja: 愛してる それじゃ

translation.en: Hey, look. Thanks for putting in a good word. I know my company's small for something this size.
translation.ja: 口添えに感謝してる小さな会社だから

translation.en: It's nothing. Just doing my job.
translation.ja: いいさ　仕事の一環だよ

translation.en: They're dying to open the upper half. And they needed somebody to check the math on their safety and security systems.
translation.ja: 上半分のオープンには安全性を査定しないと

translation.en: Plus, you were cheaper than anyone else. A lot cheaper. Like half.
translation.ja: その点で君は適任だ半額で済むからな

translation.en: -So subtle? -Yep. Solid titanium.
translation.ja: スゴいな チタン製の扉だ

translation.en: Nothing says, "Welcome to my penthouse panic room" like 10 inches of military-grade super alloy.
translation.ja: 厚さ25センチで万が一の時は避難部屋になる

translation.en: Ready to meet Oz?
Well, I think so.
I mean... [exhales] I guess if you got to live somewhere...
translation.ja: あまり住みたくはない

translation.en: Right?
[Zhao] Mr. Sawyer.
It's a pleasure to finally meet you.
[laughs] You know, I...
[laughs] I'm kidding.
Thank God. My wife only taught me one phrase.
translation.ja: 妻に ひと言だけ教わった

translation.en: Sarah, right? She's a Naval surgeon, isn't she?
translation.ja: サラか　海軍の軍医だね？

translation.en: She is. She also minored in language and East Asian studies
translation.ja: 海軍兵学校で東アジアの研究も

translation.en: -at Annapolis. -And your twins, Henry and Georgia.
translation.ja: 海軍兵学校で東アジアの研究も 双子のお子さんが

translation.en: You know your stuff.
You are the very first family we have had in the residential section of The Pearl.
translation.ja: 居住階に泊まった最初のご家族です

translation.en: I thought it might be a good test for us.
Well, they absolutely love it. It's their first visit to Hong Kong.
translation.ja: 部屋もいいし香港も初めてだ

translation.en: Ah, here they are.
Allow me to introduce my head of personal security,
translation.ja: 警備を担当するアジャーニ君と⸺

translation.en: Ajani Okeke, and Mr. Pierce
translation.ja: 警備を担当するアジャーニ君と⸺ 保険会社のピアース君

translation.en: from the Hawthorne-Stone Insurance Group.
translation.ja: 保険会社のピアース君

translation.en: A pleasure.
-Very nice to meet you, Mr. Sawyer. -Likewise.
translation.ja: 会えてうれしいです 私もだ

translation.en: After your independent third-party assessment is approved, they will confirm full coverage of The Pearl,
translation.ja: 君が安全性を認めたら保険が適用される

translation.en: which I'm told
translation.ja: 君が安全性を認めたら保険が適用される 保険料は極めて高額で⸺

translation.en: will carry the most expensive premium
translation.ja: 保険料は極めて高額で⸺

translation.en: for a single structure in underwriting history.
translation.ja: ビルとして史上最高だ

translation.en: So, shall we begin?
Can't wait.
[Will] The Pearl's anti-fire measures employ a one-of-a-kind self-sealing ventilation system
translation.ja: パールは自閉式のベント･システムと⸺

translation.en: and a robust sprinkler and CO2 array which can put out a fire in a fraction of the time.
translation.ja: スプリンクラーとＣＯ２の噴射で消火を行う

translation.en: All monitored by a control facility located over a mile away.
translation.ja: 指令は離れた制御室から送る

translation.en: You hired me to assess your safety and security systems
translation.ja: 細部まで安全性を査定しましたが⸺

translation.en: and after a complete analysis, I can say that it's the safest
translation.ja: 細部まで安全性を査定しましたが⸺ 最も安全なビルと言えます

translation.en: supertall structure in the world.
translation.ja: 最も安全なビルと言えます

translation.en: It's Fort Knox, a mile in the sky.
Once I inspect the security at the off-site facility, my job will be done,
translation.ja: 制御室を調べたら私の仕事は完了です

translation.en: and you can open the residential upper half.
translation.ja: 居住階をオープンできます

translation.en: Thank you.
You were the right man for the job. Just like Ben said.
translation.ja: ベンが言ったとおり優秀だ

translation.en: This tablet will give you administrative access
translation.ja: このタブレットでアクセスして⸺

translation.en: to The Pearl's fire and safety control measures.
Once linked to your biometric data, you'll be the only one who can access it.
translation.ja: 生体認証式だから使えるのは君だけだ

translation.en: Ben will take you to our off-site facility so you can make sure everything checks out.
translation.ja: ベンが制御室へ案内するからチェックを頼む

translation.en: [Zhao] If we hurry, there's still time.
[Will] Time for what?
For you to see it.
-Go. -Yeah.
This is the real pearl.
translation.ja: これがリアル･パールだ

translation.en: Three hundred and seventeen motion-sensitive projection panels
make this sphere the eighth wonder of the world.
[echoing] It's incredible.
[echoing] I'm over there.
In here, anything is possible.
translation.ja: ここでは何でも可能だ

translation.en: The sphere is comprised of nearly 25,000 ultra high-definition panels
translation.ja: この球体は２万5000の映像パネルで出来ていて⸺

translation.en: with embedded 8K micro cameras on both sides.
Both sides? Why is that?
Welcome to heaven, Mr. Sawyer.
Oh, God. "Welcome to heaven"? -He really said that? -Yeah.
translation.ja: スゴいな“天国へようこそ”だって？

translation.en: -But, like, cool or creepy? -Uh, little of both.
translation.ja: 最高？　最悪？ 両方だ

translation.en: God, rich guys.
-You work for them, though. -Eh.
You ever miss it?
The team?
Yeah, sure.
Yeah, but things are a lot different now. I got a wife and kids, and I haven't touched a gun in 10 years.
translation.ja: でも今では家族もいるし銃に10年 触ってない

translation.en: -You're kidding. -No.
What's that about?
Well, after what happened...
I just kind of put my sword down, you know?
translation.ja: 武器を見るのが嫌になった

translation.en: I laid it down, and I'm just never gonna pick it up again.
translation.ja: 手放したまま手にする気がうせたよ

translation.en: Come on. He was unarmed. You know, he was wearing a vest. There's no way you could've known that.
translation.ja: やつが爆弾を持ってたなんて分かるわけがない

translation.en: Just bad luck, that's all.
translation.ja: 運が悪かった　それだけさ

translation.en: Maybe.
You know, the funny thing is, without that bad luck, I, uh...
I never would've met Sarah. I never would've had my kids.
translation.ja: サラと結婚できたし子供も生まれた

translation.en: I don't know who I'd be without my family.
translation.ja: 家族がいなかったら自分を見失って まさに…

translation.en: -I'd be lost, and I'd be... -Me.
translation.ja: 家族がいなかったら自分を見失って まさに… 俺か？

translation.en: Come on, man, I'm sorry. I didn't mean it like that.
Relax. I'm kidding.
Oh, we're here. Come on.
[Will] The kids are really excited about the nighttime feeding.
[Ben] Yeah, it's a blast. They'll be there all night.
-Thanks for taking me to the off-site. -No worries.
translation.ja: 制御室へ？ 案内する　夕食をおごれ

translation.en: I mean, dinner's on you, of course.
translation.ja: 案内する　夕食をおごれ

translation.en: He's got my bag!
-You all right? -Yeah.
Oh, man. It's nasty.
-Yeah. -Better get that cleaned up, huh?
[in Cantonese] Weird.
-[Ben] Well, this feels familiar. -[Will] Yeah. [laughs]
You're gonna need some stitches for that, though, man. That's a nasty cut, bro.
-I'm gonna call Sarah. -Yeah.
Is that Zhao's tablet?
Yeah, I put it in my jacket before we left.
translation.ja: 上着のポケットに入れておいた

translation.en: -How's that for luck, huh? -Yeah, man. Nice one.
translation.ja: 上着のポケットに入れておいた ラッキーだ俺たちクビになると思ってた

translation.en: Thought we were both gonna get fired for that.
translation.ja: ラッキーだ俺たちクビになると思ってた

translation.en: [in Cantonese] I know.
I've got it.
[Will] Hey. How were the pandas?
-[elevator bell chimes] -[automated voice] Floor 98.
Well, we didn't really get to see them because Henry ate a weird candy and started throwing up,
translation.ja: ヘンリーがアメを食べて吐いたから見ないで⸺

translation.en: so we came back.
Is he okay? Did he have an attack?
translation.ja: 喘息(ぜんそく)は起きたか？

translation.en: No, he's breathing fine.
Just, you know, no pandas,
which sucks.
-It sucks. -Don't say "sucks," honey.
I'll take you there tomorrow, okay, if you're feeling better.
-I'll see you soon. -Okay. Bye.
Oh, sorry, miss. Building maintenance. We thought this floor was empty.
translation.ja: メンテの者です人はいないと思ってた

translation.en: Uh, yeah, me, too.
-Everything okay? -Everything's fine.
translation.ja: 異状はないですか？ 大丈夫電話線を調べてました

translation.en: We're just checking the phone lines.
translation.ja: 大丈夫電話線を調べてました

translation.en: I didn't know they were active yet.
Well, they will be when we finish with them.
Well, look at this precious little pair.
Are you having fun? You got the run of the castle on this floor.
translation.ja: 楽しんでる？この階は君らのものだ

translation.en: Not too bad for a big strong knight and a beautiful little princess.
translation.ja: いいぞ　強そうな騎士と美しい王女様だ

translation.en: I'm a king.
A thousand apologies, Your Majesty.
translation.ja: 失礼しました　陛下

translation.en: Come on, guys.
They were supposed to be gone.
-I know. -Want me to clean that up?
translation.ja: そうだな やります？

translation.en: -No. Leave it. -[door closes] It'll take care of itself.
translation.ja: ほっておけ殺さなくても くたばる

translation.en: -What's up? Where you going? -I got to go.
translation.ja: どこへ？ 息子が体調を崩してパールへ

translation.en: Henry's not feeling well. They went back to The Pearl.
translation.ja: 息子が体調を崩してパールへ

translation.en: -They went back to The Pearl? -Yeah.
All right. I'll call you tonight. What a day, huh?
You're not gonna make it in time.
Why'd you take it out of the bag? You should've just left it in the bag.
translation.ja: なんでタブレットをバッグから出した

translation.en: Ben, what are you talking about?
Give me the tablet, Will.
-What's going on? -What's going on?
translation.ja: よせ ミスしたくせに今は幸せ者その一方で俺は？

translation.en: You screw up, you get a whole new life.
translation.ja: ミスしたくせに今は幸せ者その一方で俺は？

translation.en: What do I get? Hmm? Medical discharge?
translation.ja: ミスしたくせに今は幸せ者その一方で俺は？ 負傷解雇で悪の道へ

translation.en: Working for thugs?
You don't know these people, Will. I don't have a choice,
translation.ja: 連中は非情だ　選択肢はない

translation.en: 'cause you messed it up.
I know you're hurting, brother, but you don't want to do this.
We're not brothers.
Ben. Stop! Stop!
Stop!
Come here.
Here, stay with me.
Let's get you up. Come on, let's go. Sit up. There we go.
translation.ja: いいか　起き上がるんだ

translation.en: -[Ben groaning] -Let's get you over here.
translation.ja: いいか　起き上がるんだ こっちへ

translation.en: Okay, here, stay with me. Hold this here. Hold it tight.
translation.ja: 頑張れ　強く押さえろ

translation.en: I need you to tell me what happened, okay? All right? I can help you if you tell me what happened.
translation.ja: 助けるから何があったのか話してくれ

translation.en: They weren't supposed to go back, Will.
They weren't supposed to be there.
Who wasn't supposed to be there?
Sarah and the kids.
translation.ja: サラと あの子供たち

translation.en: What did you do?
Light a man's house on fire
and you find out what he truly loves.
[automated voice] Shelter in place.
-Mom? What's going on? -[alarm wailing in distance] [automated voice] Anti-fire measures activated.
I don't know. Let me go check.
[automated voice] Shelter in place.
Anti-fire measures activated.
Stay on the couch.
-Should we evacuate? -[alarm beeping]
Evacuate?
Yes, take a helicopter.
Why would we do that?
Well, the building's on fire.
The building isn't on fire. The 96th floor is on fire.
translation.ja: 火事なのはビルでなく96階だ

translation.en: We're more than a hundred stories above that, and the anti-fire measures will keep it there.
translation.ja: 100階以上 下だし消火も始まってる

translation.en: We're perfectly safe here, I assure you.
translation.ja: ここは安全だ　安心しろ

translation.en: What did you do?
I set you up. They need the tablet.
translation.ja: お前をハメたタブレットのために

translation.en: Run.
translation.ja: 逃げろ　連中が来る ウィル

translation.en: They're coming, Will. They're gonna kill you.
translation.ja: 逃げろ　連中が来る ウィル 殺される

translation.en: Who's coming? Who?
-Run. -Ben?
Ben?
[gasps] Shit!
Hello, Will.
Thank you.
[officer speaking Cantonese] Freeze!
Go!
Hey, what's up?
The fire's contained on the 96th.
We're evacuating the floors below the fire line.
translation.ja: 〈下階の人を避難させています〉

translation.en: What about the people above the 96th?
The owner is in the penthouse on the 220th.
But the fire will never get there.
The anti-fire measures have activated.
What about the people on other floors?
There's no one else above the 96th.
It's empty.
[automated voice] Anti-fire measures activated.
translation.ja: 消火作業が開始されました

translation.en: Okay, guys, in the bathroom.
[automated voice] Shelter in place.  Come on.
-Come here, bud. -I'm fine, Mom. I don't need it.
You're fine now, honey, but we're about to go out there,
and there's a lot of smoke and a lot of bad air, and we don't want you to have an attack, okay?
translation.ja: 煙を吸うわ喘息の発作を防がないと

translation.en: Georgia, dunk them all the way. Make sure they get completely wet, -the hand towels, too. -Okay.
translation.ja: ジョージアしっかりぬらしてね

translation.en: Two quick inhales, please.
Mom? Are we gonna die?
translation.ja: ママ　私たち死ぬの？

translation.en: No. Baby, we are not gonna die. We are gonna be just fine.
translation.ja: 死んだりしないわ　大丈夫よ

translation.en: I promise.
[Xia over radio] We're in position at the off-site control facility.
Do it.
There you are. Baby, there's a fire in the building.
translation.ja: ビルが火事になったの

translation.en: I know. All right, look, I can't get to you.
translation.ja: 見てる 封鎖されてて中へ入れない管理パネルを⸺

translation.en: The police have the entire building locked down. I want you to get out of there right now.
translation.ja: 封鎖されてて中へ入れない管理パネルを⸺

translation.en: Go inside the hallway, there should be a logistics panel.
If you show it to me, I can tell you where it's safe to go.
Take the kids with you. I'm gonna stay on the phone.
Hand me those towels. Come on.
[automated voice] Occupancy warning on floor 98.
Will Sawyer's family unlocked their apartment door an hour ago.
translation.ja: ウィル･ソーヤーの家族がビルの中にいる

translation.en: They're in the building. Send two men.
translation.ja: ウィル･ソーヤーの家族がビルの中にいる エレベーターを手動で使い家族をここへ

translation.en: Use the manual override code on the elevators. -Bring them here. -Yes, sir.
translation.ja: エレベーターを手動で使い家族をここへ

translation.en: You two, go.
[Mr. Pierce] What? Listen, the fire isn't just gonna go out. We need to leave now.
translation.ja: 火はまだ消えてません避難すべきだ

translation.en: I can only access nominal control. I can't lock out the on-site functions without the...
translation.ja: ビルにある設備にアクセスするには…

translation.en: Root access. Okay.
translation.ja: 最高アクセス権(ルートアクセス)ね　よし

translation.en: We're in.
The entire system has been compromised. I'm completely locked out.
translation.ja: システムがやられた入れない

translation.en: What do you mean, you're locked out? I thought that couldn't happen.
[Xia over radio] We have full control of the anti-fire systems.
translation.ja: 消火設備を乗っ取ったわ

translation.en: Seal all the fire doors from 95 to the ground.
translation.ja: 95階以下の⸺ 防火扉を閉鎖96階以上の消火設備を無効に

translation.en: And disable all anti-fire measures from 96 to the top.
translation.ja: 防火扉を閉鎖96階以上の消火設備を無効に

translation.en: [Will over phone] Everything's gonna be okay. The logistics panel should be to your left.
translation.ja: 管理パネルは左側にあるはずだ

translation.en: -[Sarah coughs] -Tell me what you see.
All the floors above us are yellow.
-What does that mean? -It means the entire fire system
translation.ja: 黄色に 消火設備が無効だ

translation.en: above you is offline.
Sarah, listen to me. The fire is not gonna stop.
I want you to get out of there right now and go up.
translation.ja: 消えない　上へ行け

translation.en: Go up, keep going up, don't stop, don't look back.
[Botha over radio] Now force the fire up.
Open the elevator shaft air vents and feed it with fresh oxygen.
translation.ja: エア･ベントを開けて酸素を送り込め

translation.en: Let it burn.
Ladies and gentlemen,
I give you a $6.5 billion chimney.
translation.ja: 65億ドルの煙突をお目にかける

translation.en: [coughs] Mrs. Sawyer?
We're with the building security. Come with us, please.
translation.ja: 安全管理の者です来て下さい

translation.en: -No! Get back! -[Sarah] Run!
-No! No! -[crowd screams]
[speaking Cantonese] Oh, my God.
[Ajani] What is your status? Report.
Do you copy?
No one could survive that. They're gone.
[Botha] We're moving into position. You know what to do next.
translation.ja: 移動する　そっちは⸺ 任せた

translation.en: -[Sarah] Go, hurry, up the stairs. -[Will] Sarah.
Will Sawyer...
Hands up!
Please. You don't understand. My family's inside. Listen to me.
translation.ja: 家族がビルの中にいる

translation.en: I have to get to them.
Turn around!
Now!
So, you have full systems control from the tablet. There's no facial recognition needed.
translation.ja: タブレットで何でもできる顔認証は もう不要

translation.en: All other access points to The Pearl mainframe have been encrypted.
translation.ja: ビルへのアクセスも暗号化した

translation.en: The entire building now, it's locked out.
I used my own logarithmic base cipher to encrypt it,
so I am literally the only human on the planet Earth that can crack this.
translation.ja: 僕以外の者に破ることはできない

translation.en: Yeah, it's pretty smart, right?
Not that smart.
[Ajani] If the fire continues to climb, it will superheat the air around the helipad, making liftoff impossible.
translation.ja: このままだと高温になりヘリが飛べません

translation.en: Our departure window is closing, sir. I hate to say it, but it is now or never. [automated voice] Warning. Anti-fire measures offline.
translation.ja: ヘリで今 逃げないと永遠に機会を失います

translation.en: Happy? You got to play the hero, it didn't work, it's time to go.
translation.ja: あの家族も死んだ逃げるしかない

translation.en: [Zhao] All right, Mr. Pierce. You'll get your wish. Get the helo ready.
translation.ja: 分かった ピアース君ヘリの準備をしろ

translation.en: Prep the bird.
[in Cantonese] What do we know about Sawyer?
[in Cantonese] Marine Corps, Bronze Star...
FBI for six years, Hostage Rescue for eight.
Wife, two kids.
She's a combat surgeon. Three tours Afghanistan.
Don't have a location on them yet.
Will Sawyer was hired as a safety assessor.
translation.ja: 〈ソーヤーは安全査定員で⸺〉 〈設備にアクセスできます〉

translation.en: He had access to the security protocols.
Maybe he shut down the anti-fire measures.
translation.ja: 〈彼が消火を無効にしたのかも〉

translation.en: Do me a favor, go find Will Sawyer.
I'd like to ask him some questions.
Sergeant Han?
Never mind, I found him.
[in Cantonese] Holy shit.
[in Cantonese] Send a response team. I want to talk to him.
translation.ja: 〈捕まえろ　事情を聞きたい〉

translation.en: The elevator is locked! Hurry!
Shit.
What the hell is he doing?
He's climbing above the fire line.
Sir, I can't protect you if you don't tell me what's going on.
translation.ja: 警護のためにも真相を話して下さい

translation.en: This isn't just a fire. It's a plot.
-I can't say for sure. -I don't need facts.
translation.ja: どうかな 背後にいるのはだれだと思いますか？

translation.en: What is your gut telling you? Who's behind this?
translation.ja: 背後にいるのはだれだと思いますか？

translation.en: Kores Botha.
I don't understand.
If a man like Botha wanted you dead, there are easier ways.
translation.ja: もっと簡単に あなたを殺せる

translation.en: [scoffs] He doesn't want me dead. At least not yet.
translation.ja: 殺す気はない　今はまだ

translation.en: He wants this.
And lighting The Pearl on fire is the only way he can get it.
translation.ja: これを奪うための放火だ

translation.en: Is there something I should know?
Yes. The helicopter is ready.
He's trying to get inside.
Sorry, boys.
Shit.
Go, go, go!
Don't move!
-Hands up! -Okay. Don't shoot.
[officer in Cantonese] Turn around!
[in English] Turn around.
[in Cantonese] Hold fire!
It's too hot! We're losing altitude!
Yes!
[in Cantonese] Why would anyone want to get into a burning building?
[in Cantonese] Inspector... We have a last known location
translation.ja: 〈警部補〉 〈ソーヤーの家族の居所が判明〉

translation.en: on Will Sawyer's family.
translation.ja: 〈ソーヤーの家族の居所が判明〉

translation.en: [in Cantonese] Let me guess... They're in the building.
-[Sarah] This way. -[Henry coughing]
You're doing great. Wait, hold on. Come here.
translation.ja: その調子 止まってまたタオルをぬらすの

translation.en: -Baby, we're gonna wet these again, okay? -Okay, Mommy.
translation.ja: 止まってまたタオルをぬらすの

translation.en: Okay, baby. Calm down. Calm down.
translation.ja: ヘンリー　落ち着いて

translation.en: Okay, one second.
-[metallic thumping] -What's that sound?
It's the fire, baby.
Where are we gonna go?
I don't know.
That's the bridge to the waterfall. We'll keep heading up.
translation.ja: 滝へ行く橋よ　あそこへ

translation.en: Run! Go!
Come on. Up the stairs. Okay.
Keep going.
Don't stop.
Helicopter is ready for departure.
-[watch beeps] -[chiming]
Wait.
What is it?
-That is not our pilot. -Botha.
[Ajani] Get down!
Go, go!
Long time, Botha.
Yeah. Did you miss me?
I see you met my associate. Surprise, surprise.
translation.ja: 彼は俺の仲間だ驚いたかな？

translation.en: Why don't you just shoot me and take it?
You think I'm stupid, huh?
You know I can't do that. 'Cause the men I work for will kill me if I don't get it back for them.
translation.ja: 例の物を持ち帰らないと雇い主に殺される

translation.en: You should've paid me and been done with it. But no. Clever boys like you always think you can be clever.
translation.ja: 金に細工なんかするからお前は墓穴を掘った

translation.en: So how's this for clever?
I'm gonna take you and your drive and your helicopter.
translation.ja: お前とブツを乗せてヘリで飛び立つ

translation.en: And I'm going to make you watch as your building burns to ash
translation.ja: 大事なビルが灰になっていくのを⸺

translation.en: and there's nothing you can do about it.
Look out!
Zhao!
He sealed himself in the penthouse. Open the doors.
translation.ja: ペントハウスの扉を開けろ

translation.en: The penthouse floor has its own subroutine. Zhao must have isolated that system.
translation.ja: あそこには独立したシステムがある

translation.en: I can't open the doors with this tablet.
translation.ja: 〝アクセス不能 〞 扉は開けられない 〝アクセス不能 〞

translation.en: Wait. It looks like Will Sawyer's in the building.
translation.ja: 待って ソーヤーがビルにいるわ別の動きも

translation.en: And I've got a movement alert.
translation.ja: ソーヤーがビルにいるわ別の動きも

translation.en: It's his family.
They're still alive.
[Botha] Zhao!
You're not gonna get in using force. You need someone who knows the system.
translation.ja: システムを知ってる者がいないとダメだ

translation.en: And I know just the man for the job.
Sawyer.
If anyone can get in, it's him. He's in the building. Just need to find him.
translation.ja: 彼なら中へ入れるビルにいるから捜そう

translation.en: We don't need to find him.
We know what he wants.
If you can't fix it with duct tape...
Then you ain't using enough duct tape.
All right, you were on the 98th floor, east side stairwell.
Means you would've had to go through the park.
I'll find you. Hang on. I'll find you.
translation.ja: 必ず見つける　待ってろ

translation.en: -Stay with me, baby. Okay? Okay. -[Henry coughing]
translation.ja: ママから離れちゃダメ

translation.en: Come on. Almost there.
Mrs. Sawyer.
Nice to meet you.
I got them. They're in the park.
-Kids, too. -[Sarah] Do what he says. Okay?
translation.ja: 来い ガキも 来るのよ

translation.en: That's right. Listen to your mummy.
translation.ja: ママの言うことを聞け

translation.en: [Sarah] It's okay, guys. Everything's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫よ ママの言うとおりにして

translation.en: Just do exactly what I say.
translation.ja: ママの言うとおりにして

translation.en: Run! Run!
-Mom! -Come on!
Just have to go up a little bit farther.
Georgia!
Henry!
I'll find another way up. Keep going. Go all the way up to the waterfall.
translation.ja: このまま滝の方へ行くんだ

translation.en: I'll go around to the other side. -I'll meet you there. [coughs] -Okay.
[Mr. Pierce] I'm not supposed to kill you, but I think your kids will be enough.
translation.ja: 死んでもらうエサは子供で十分だ

translation.en: [Will] Sarah!
-Are you okay? -Yeah, I'm okay.
How did you get in the building?
It's a long story. Where are the kids?
-Mom! Dad! -[Sarah] Oh, God, are you okay?
translation.ja: ママ　パパ そこで止まって

translation.en: -Don't move, all right? -Where's your sister?
translation.ja: そこで止まって 妹は？

translation.en: She's at the top of the park by the waterfall.
Dad!
Honey, stay right there. -Daddy's coming for you. -Okay.
-How do we get across the bridge? -[coughing]
[Will] Let's figure this out.
It's gonna be okay, baby.
The bridge is unstable.
translation.ja: クソ 橋が揺れる　力を合わせよう

translation.en: -All right, we got to do this together. -Okay.
translation.ja: 橋が揺れる　力を合わせよう

translation.en: When I tell you to, walk it out, drop it, and go get him, okay? -Okay. -All right.
translation.ja: 板を渡して息子の所へ

translation.en: What are you gonna do?
I'm gonna hold the bridge steady.
[Sarah] Hold on, baby.
-Okay. -Go!
[Sarah] Okay, baby, here I come.
Here I come.
Oh, I got you. I got you.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫　安心して

translation.en: Okay. Come back, hurry!
That's it. That's it. Come back. Come on.
translation.ja: それでいい　こっちへ

translation.en: -Okay. As still as you can. -[board creaking]
Okay, we're almost there.
Mom!
[straining] You can do it. You can do it.
That's it. Get up.
I can't hold it anymore! Jump!
[sighs] Okay.
Come on. Will, what the hell is going on?
I don't know, but I got to get you guys out of this building. -Henry can't breathe. -I know.
translation.ja: さあな とにかく避難だ

translation.en: Georgia, I'll be right there!
Okay, Dad.
All right, these elevators operate on electromagnetic induction.
translation.ja: 電磁制御のエレベーターだ

translation.en: When there's a fire, they're held in place by a fail-safe brake.
translation.ja: 火事の時は自動的に止まる

translation.en: When I cut this cable, you're gonna fall.
Just listen to me. You're gonna fall through the fire.
translation.ja: 大丈夫　火の中を落ちて⸺

translation.en: The magnets are gonna kick back on once you pass the fire line.
translation.ja: 通過後 電磁制御が働く

translation.en: But I need you to pull this handle in order to engage the braking system.
translation.ja: ブレーキはこのレバーで

translation.en: It's about 500 feet from here until the fire line. I want you to count to five and pull the handle.
translation.ja: ５つ数え レバーを引けば安全な階で止まる

translation.en: This is crazy.
Trust me.
-[Will] How you doing, buddy? -I'm scared.
It's okay to be scared. In order to be brave, we got to be a little scared.
translation.ja: 勇敢になるには少し怖がらないと

translation.en: All right? Now, I need you to be brave right now. -Can you do that for me? -Yeah.
translation.ja: 勇敢になれ　大丈夫か？

translation.en: I want you to hold on to your mom. Daddy loves who?
translation.ja: ママと乗れパパが愛するのは？

translation.en: Me.
That's right.
Okay, baby. We're gonna sit down. We're gonna brace ourselves, all right?
translation.ja: 座って体を支え合うのよ

translation.en: I love you.
You better.
[Sarah] Count with me, baby. Five...
[both] Four...
Three...
Two, one!
Mom!
-[man] Hey! -[gasps] Oh, God.
It's okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だ　何もしない

translation.en: We're the good guys.
You're safe. Come with us.
translation.ja: 味方だ　安心しろ おいで

translation.en: Daddy!
-[gasps] -[man] Found you. You little shit.
translation.ja: 見つけたぞ　ガキめ

translation.en: Georgia! Come on.
Just the man I was looking for.
Your Majesty.
I hear your dad knows everything about this building.
translation.ja: パパはビルに詳しいそうだ

translation.en: [Botha] All I care about is what my business partner is holding behind those doors.
translation.ja: 俺のパートナーのジャオが持ってる物を⸺

translation.en: And you're going to get it for me.
[Will] Listen to me. The only way those doors open is from the inside,
translation.ja: 扉は中からでないと開かない

translation.en: or the fire alarm on this floor triggers it, but that can't happen because you took the entire system offline.
translation.ja: 火災警報で開くがお前らが無効にした

translation.en: [Botha] Is that so? Well, let me tell you something.
translation.ja: そうか？　言っておく

translation.en: Every man has a weakness. It's easy to find.
translation.ja: 皆 弱点がある見つけるのは簡単

translation.en: Once you know what he loves, you have it.
translation.ja: 愛するもの　それさ

translation.en: Zhao, he loves this building. And you, your weakness
translation.ja: ジャオは このビルお前の弱点は⸺

translation.en: is your family.
So now we're going to find out how much you love your family, Will.
translation.ja: どれだけ家族を愛してるか見せてもらう

translation.en: Listen to me. Opening those doors from this floor can't be done.
translation.ja: この階で扉は開けられない

translation.en: Anything can be done with the proper motivation.
translation.ja: 何でも可能だ強い動機があれば

translation.en: Don't hurt him! Stop!
Okay, cuzzie.
You're gonna bring Zhao and what he's holding behind those doors to me.
translation.ja: ジャオと やつの宝物を俺に

translation.en: Or I'm gonna throw your daughter off the fucking roof.
translation.ja: 娘を屋上から落とすぞ

translation.en: I hear it's like heaven up there.
[Botha] Straight to the roof, boys. We're not gonna wait around here to burn.
translation.ja: 屋上に出るぞここにも火が回る

translation.en: Daddy!
Daddy! Let me go!
-Daddy, help me! -[shushing]
Georgia!
[newsman over TV] ...into the destruction of Zhao Long Ji's Pearl tower.
translation.ja: パール･ビルが燃えています

translation.en: We're getting reports of activity on the ground floor of the building.
We're going to go live to Kowloon Plaza, where we may have some survivors coming out of the building.
translation.ja: ビルから生存者が出てきた模様

translation.en: It's difficult to imagine how anyone could have survived the raging fire on the upper floors.
translation.ja: 猛火の中からよく生還できたものです

translation.en: [Henry] My dad's inside. He saved us. -He's still inside. -[reporter] Is there any other news?
translation.ja: 助けてくれたパパがまだ中に

translation.en: He's a good guy!
[newsman] It appears this may be the family of William Sawyer, the American security consultant...
translation.ja: ウィル･ソーヤーの家族のようです

translation.en: Okay. There's got to be a way to open these doors.
translation.ja: 開ける方法はあるはずだ

translation.en: Where did you put the subroutine panels that controls them? Where did you hide it, Zhao?
translation.ja: 独立したシステムのパネルは？

translation.en: Behind the turbines? Oh, come on, man.
translation.ja: 風力タービンの裏？　そんな

translation.en: Shit.
How did you get out of the building? Can you comment?
translation.ja: どうやってビルの外へ？

translation.en: [Sergeant Han] And you claim your husband isn't involved?
It's not a claim. He's not involved.
How many of them did you say you saw?
One in a suit, two others in coveralls.
translation.ja: １人はスーツ 私が話した男には訛(なま)りが

translation.en: The one that I spoke to, he had an accent.
translation.ja: 私が話した男には訛(なま)りが

translation.en: Scandinavian, I think. Six-foot, white, muscular.
translation.ja: 北欧の訛り身長180で筋肉質の白人

translation.en: There. Top row. Second from the right.
Is this the man you saw?
That's him. Who is he?
Kores Botha. Ex-military.
translation.ja: コレス･ボタ　元軍人

translation.en: Has a nasty crew with him, too. High-end muscle for three different crime syndicates.
translation.ja: 仲間がいる犯罪組織の実動部隊だ

translation.en: Inspector...
This doesn't pass the smell test. This isn't Botha's M.O.
Why would he trap himself in the fire?
translation.ja: 〈自分を火災に巻き込んだり⸺〉

translation.en: And why would he cut off his only way out?
It doesn't make any sense.
[in Cantonese] They're going to jump.
[in English] Excuse me?
One of them was carrying a container,
translation.ja: 羽の絵がある荷物を犯人が持ってた

translation.en: and it had a logo with wings on it, and the word "Sirin."
translation.ja: 羽の絵がある荷物を犯人が持ってた “シリン”というロゴが

translation.en: Look it up.
This is stupid.
This is The Pearl.
A BASE jump from 1,000 meters up gives you roughly about two kilometers descent distance.
translation.ja: 高さ1000メートルだと着地点は２キロ先

translation.en: Now, if you're right, they will land somewhere within this circle.
translation.ja: この円のどこかに着地するはずだ

translation.en: Somewhere open and flat, secluded.
translation.ja: 平坦で目立たない場所へ

translation.en: Now, they wouldn't go for Victoria Park. There's too many trees to get hung up on.
translation.ja: この公園は木が多くてダメだ

translation.en: South, they wouldn't clear the peak.
North, maybe, but it's a longer haul to an open spot.
translation.ja: 北は平坦な場所までの距離がかなりある

translation.en: What about this? What's that?
That's nothing. It's a construction site. Bay Dredge.
translation.ja: そこは ただの建設現場よ

translation.en: You can't seriously be considering this.
For all we know, she could be in on it.
translation.ja: 〈彼女は一味かもしれません〉

translation.en: You think I would willingly trap my own children in a burning building?
translation.ja: 子供を燃えてるビルに？

translation.en: [in English] I think you could be playing a role. This could all be part of your husband's plan.
translation.ja: ソーヤーの計画の一部かもね

translation.en: Take me there. If I am wrong and it's empty, then what have you lost?
translation.ja: 私を埠頭(ふとう)へ空振りでもいいでしょ？

translation.en: But if I am right, this might be your only chance to catch the people responsible for this whole thing.
translation.ja: でも私が正しければ一味を検挙できる

translation.en: My family is in there.
Please.
[Sarah] Oh, my God.
Come on, baby. Come on.
[softly] Two, three.
One, two, three.
Okay, easy.
Just cut the wire, doors will open, climb back up there.
translation.ja: 配線を切れば扉が開く

translation.en: Shit!
Oh, come on.
Does that look like someone with a plan to you? Now do you believe me?
translation.ja: これでも夫が一味なの？私を信じる？

translation.en: Don't move.
You're too close.
What?
-[groans] -We need to talk.
All right, if we're gonna get out of here, you're gonna have to tell me the truth.
translation.ja: 脱出したいなら真実を話せ

translation.en: How does a man like that call you his business partner?
His name is Kores Botha. He handles extortion for three powerful crime syndicates.
translation.ja: やつはボタ組織のために ゆすりをやる

translation.en: And when I began construction on The Pearl, Botha came to me.
translation.ja: パールを建てる時 現れて⸺

translation.en: He said that if I didn't pay him, he'll cripple my labor force and keep me from ever completing this place.
translation.ja: 金を払わないと建てさせないと言った

translation.en: -You paid him. -Yes.
But what he didn't know was that
I hid tracking software inside my wire transfer.
translation.ja: 追跡ソフトを仕込んで

translation.en: As Botha laundered my payments
translation.ja: ボタが資金洗浄してる間も追跡してた

translation.en: through their offshore accounts,
translation.ja: ボタが資金洗浄してる間も追跡してた 〝口座を追跡 〞

translation.en: I was able to trace every transaction,
translation.ja: ボタが資金洗浄してる間も追跡してた 〝口座を追跡 〞 ボタが資金洗浄してる間も追跡してた

translation.en: giving me their bank accounts,
translation.ja: 口座番号や口座名すべてをだ 〝口座を解析 〞

translation.en: their names, their identities.
translation.ja: 口座番号や口座名すべてをだ

translation.en: This was my insurance policy. Botha would never be able to extort money from me again.
translation.ja: この情報があればもうゆすられない

translation.en: But when the syndicates found out that they were compromised,
they threatened to destroy Botha if he didn't clean up his mess.
translation.ja: 片をつけろと ボタを脅した

translation.en: If he kills me, the copies I've made will be sent to the authorities.
translation.ja: 私が殺されたらコピーは当局へ

translation.en: But if he gets his hands on this, the original,
translation.ja: だが原本(ドライブ)を奪えば⸺

translation.en: he can reverse engineer my tracking software and hide the identities before anyone's the wiser.
translation.ja: 追跡ソフトを無効にして再び口座を隠せる

translation.en: So, he lit this entire building on fire knowing that you would take the most valuable thing in this world to you and run.
translation.ja: 火を放って原本を持ち出させる計画か

translation.en: -And his plan worked. -Not yet, it hasn't.
We're gonna give Botha what he came here for.
As soon as he has the drive, he'll kill us both.
Maybe.
But he has my daughter. And her life is what matters to me, not mine.
translation.ja: だが俺の命より娘の命の方が大切だ

translation.en: Now, I'm taking that drive to the roof.
You could either be attached to it or not. It's your choice, Zhao.
translation.ja: 力ずくで奪ってもだどうする？

translation.en: All right.
So, what's the plan?
You got any duct tape?
-Daddy! -[Botha] Hey!
Mr. Sawyer, see, I knew you'd find a way.
translation.ja: ソーヤーさん さすがだ

translation.en: You have what's mine, and I have what's yours.
translation.ja: 大事なものの交換といこう

translation.en: Give me the drive.
translation.ja: 原本をよこせ　ジャオも

translation.en: -And bring Zhao. -No. My daughter first.
translation.ja: 原本をよこせ　ジャオも 娘が先だ

translation.en: -I can't let you do this. -Hey, what are you doing?
translation.ja: 残念だな 計画と違う

translation.en: -This is not in the plan. -Turn around.
translation.ja: 計画と違う 向こう向け

translation.en: He's got my daughter. Please, don't do this to me.
[Zhao] Turn around!
I want a parachute! You need me alive.
translation.ja: パラシュートをよこせ

translation.en: -A parachute or you get nothing! -Give him your parachute.
translation.ja: すべて失うぞ 渡せ

translation.en: Give him your parachute.
translation.ja: 渡すんだ　お前のを

translation.en: [Zhao] Bring it here.
Stop. Drop it there.
Come. Bring the drive.
Here's what you want?
Go get it.
Run!
Doors! Come on!
Georgia.
[Georgia echoing] Daddy!
[Inspector Wu] It looks like you were right. We've got armed suspects up ahead.
translation.ja: やはり武装した連中がいる

translation.en: [speaking Cantonese] Police!
Stay down, don't leave the car.
Thanks. You almost had me convinced out there.
Let's go find your daughter.
Go, go, go!
[Zhao] Go. Go get her.
I'm coming back for you.
Turn around.
Turn around now!
You shoot me, I drop this and the girl.
translation.ja: 撃ったら爆弾と一緒に落とす

translation.en: Daddy!
-Disarm now! -No, please!
translation.ja: 銃を捨てろ！ やめて

translation.en: Daddy!
You win.
It's gonna be okay, honey. It's gonna be okay.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だぞ　心配するな

translation.en: Now toss me the drive.
All right. But there's one thing you should know first.
translation.ja: 分かっただが言っとくことがある

translation.en: What?
I'm behind you.
[sighs heavily] I got you. I got you. I got you.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫　安心しろ

translation.en: -Daddy's got you. -[coughs]
-[tablet beeps] -[Inspector Wu] What's that?
I don't know, she had it on her.
It looks like it controls the building.
Hey, let's wait for someone who knows what they're doing.
My husband and daughter are in that building, it's on fire right now. I'm not gonna wait another damn second.
translation.ja: 夫と娘が中にいる待ってられない

translation.en: [speaking Cantonese] Take her away.
Come here. Stay down, stay low. I'm gonna find us a way out of here.
translation.ja: こっちへ　脱出ルートを探す

translation.en: What are you doing?
I'm trying to bring the fire systems back online.
Is it working?
[sighs] Not yet.
-Daddy! -Come here, come here. Come here.
Come on.
Come on.
-[Georgia whimpers] -Daddy's got you.
[panting] Daddy's got you. Daddy's got you.
translation.ja: お前を絶対に離さない

translation.en: I got you. Look at me. Look at me.
translation.ja: 大丈夫 パパはだれを愛してる？

translation.en: -Daddy loves who? -Me.
translation.ja: パパはだれを愛してる？ 私

translation.en: Daddy loves you. Daddy loves you.
translation.ja: そうだ　お前を愛してる

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -No.
I'm so sorry.
It worked.
How the hell did you do that?
I rebooted the control systems for the entire building.
I turned it off and on again.
[Will] Zhao! Zhao, let's go.
Let's go. Come on.
Here.
What are you gonna do now?
Rebuild.
-Sarah? -[reporter] One question...
Has anyone seen my wife?
What about my son?
Henry!
Sarah!
[distantly] Henry!
Sarah!
Mom!
Dad!
You okay? You okay? Are you hurt?
No, no, we're okay.
I'm okay, Dad.
[Sarah] We're fine. We're fine.
I love you.
I love you, too.
You really need a shower.
-Yes, I do. -[laughs]
-Let's go home. -Oh, yeah.
[Inspector Wu] Will Sawyer.
Nice to finally meet you. You've got quite a family there.
translation.ja: やっと会えたとてもいい家族だな

translation.en: I'm a lucky man.
